title: Blood rune

properties.value: Blood runes are one of the runes used to cast spells in the Magic skill. They are used in some of the highest level spells, the lowest of which is Ruby Crossbow Bolt Enchant, and the highest is Heal Group. Blood runes are also used in charging the Scythe of Vitur, Sanguinesti staff, and soul bearer.

Item ID565

Blood runes are one of the runes used to cast spells in the Magic skill. They are used in some of the highest level spells, the lowest of which is Ruby Crossbow Bolt Enchant, and the highest is Heal Group. Blood runes are also used in charging the Scythe of Vitur, Sanguinesti staff, and soul bearer.

Contents

  • 1 Runecraft info
    • 1.1 True Blood Altar
    • 1.2 False Blood Altar
  • 2 Spells requiring blood runes
  • 3 Products
  • 4 Item sources
    • 4.1 Store locations
    • 4.2 Item spawns
  • 5 Changes
    • 5.1 Gallery (historical)
  • 6 Trivia

Runecraft info[edit | edit source]

After Sins of the Father is completed, players can craft blood runes from pure essence at the true Blood Altar in Meiyerditch Laboratories. Each essence gives 10.5 experience.

With 100% Arceuus favour and 77 Runecraft, players can craft blood runes from dark essence fragments at the Kourend's Blood Altar in Arceuus. Each fragment grants 23.8 experience, excluding the 0.625 experience from binding the dense essence (95.2 experience per dark essence block, and 2.5 experience per block for binding). It is possible to reach approximately 38,000 experience per hour crafting blood runes. Using the full graceful outfit and having 80+ Agility should be enough to have enough run energy to last the whole trip, depending on how often the player has to switch between the essence mines. Players with an achievement diary cape may also use the Abyss (using the teleport to Lesser Fanatic) to achieve slightly higher experience rates of approximately 45,000 per hour at peak efficiency, although it involves a slight risk of being attacked by other players. Unlike the true Blood Altar, no item is needed to enter in order to runecraft.

Crafting blood runes in Meiyerditch Laboratories via the Abyss provides approximately double the amount of runes crafted per hour compared to at Arceuus. However, Arceuus requires less actions and focus, less danger due to not needing to enter the Wilderness, and provides about 20% more Runecraft experience, while also providing a small amount of Mining and Crafting experience.

Blood runes can also be crafted at the Ourania altar below level 77 Runecraft, however they are received relatively rarely.

Players can activate and carry a Blood essence which will provide a 50% chance per essence or fragment crafted to produce an extra blood rune. It will disappear after 1,000 extra blood runes have been crafted.

They are used in some of the highest level spells, the lowest of which is [[Enchant Crossbow Bolt (Ruby)|Ruby Crossbow Bolt Enchant]], and the highest is [[Heal Group]]. Blood runes are also used in charging the [[Scythe of Vitur]], [[Sanguinesti staff]], and [[soul bearer]]. ==Runecraft info== After [[Sins of the Father]] is completed, players can craft blood runes from [[pure essence]] at the [[Blood Altar|true Blood Altar]] in [[Meiyerditch Laboratories]]. Each essence gives 10.5 [[experience]]. With 100% Arceuus favour and 77 [[Runecraft]], players can craft blood runes from [[dark essence fragments]] at the [[Blood Altar (Kourend)|Kourend's Blood Altar]] in [[Arceuus]]. Each fragment grants 23.8 experience, excluding the 0.625 experience from binding the dense essence (95.2 experience per dark essence block, and 2.5 experience per block for binding). It is possible to reach approximately 38,000 experience per hour crafting blood runes. Using the full [[graceful outfit]] and having 80+ [[Agility]] should be enough to have enough run energy to last the whole trip, depending on how often the player has to switch between the essence mines. Players with an [[achievement diary cape]] may also use the [[Abyss]] (using the teleport to [[Lesser Fanatic]]) to achieve slightly higher experience rates of approximately 45,000 per hour at peak efficiency, although it involves a slight risk of being attacked by other players. Unlike the true Blood Altar, no item is needed to enter in order to runecraft. Crafting blood runes in Meiyerditch Laboratories via the Abyss provides approximately double the amount of runes crafted per hour compared to at Arceuus. However, Arceuus requires less actions and focus, less danger due to not needing to enter the Wilderness, and provides about 20% more Runecraft experience, while also providing a small amount of Mining and Crafting experience. Blood runes can also be crafted at the [[Ourania altar]] below level 77 Runecraft, however they are received relatively rarely. Players can activate and carry a [[Blood essence]] which will provide a 50% chance per essence or fragment crafted to produce an extra blood rune. It will disappear after 1,000 extra blood runes have been crafted. ===True Blood Altar=== {{Tabber |tab1=Pure essence |tab1content={{Recipe |skill1 = Runecraft |skill1lvl = 77 |skill1boostable = yes |skill1exp = 10.5 |members = yes |ticks = 1 |facilities = Blood Altar |tools = Blood tiara, Blood talisman |mat1 = Pure essence |output1 = Blood rune }} |tab2=Daeyalt essence |tab2content={{Recipe |skill1 = Runecraft |skill1lvl = 77 |skill1boostable = yes |skill1exp = 15.75 |members = yes |ticks = 1 |facilities = Blood Altar |tools = Blood tiara, Blood talisman |mat1 = Daeyalt essence |mat1cost = no |output1 = Blood rune }} |tab3=Guardian essence |tab3content={{Recipe |skill1 = Runecraft |skill1lvl = 77 |skill1boostable = yes |skill1exp = |members = yes |ticks = 1 |facilities = Blood Altar |mat1 = Guardian essence |mat1itemnote = Accessible only in the [[Guardians of the Rift]] minigame. |mat1cost = no |output1 = Blood rune }} }} ===False Blood Altar=== {{Recipe |skill2 = Runecraft |skill2lvl = 77 |skill2boostable = yes |skill2exp = 23.8 |members = yes |ticks = 1 |facilities = Blood Altar (Kourend) |mat1 = Dark essence fragments |mat1cost = no |output1 = Blood rune }} {{Blood Rune Spells}} ==Products== {{Uses material list|Blood rune}} ==Item sources== {{Drop sources|Blood rune}} ===Store locations=== {{Store locations list|Blood rune}} ===Item spawns=== {{ItemSpawnTableHead}} {{ItemSpawnLine|name=Blood rune|location=[[Wilderness]] -
